c:attribute.name: primaryWaterHeater
c:attribute.description: When the first water heater is added it will be populated with that value. This will be null if no water heater devices exist in the system.

c:attribute.name: primaryWaterSoftener
c:attribute.description: When the first water softener is added it will be populated with that value. This will be null if no water softener devices exist in the system.

c:attribute.name: closedWaterValves
c:attribute.description: The set of water shutoff valves that are currently closed.

c:attribute.name: waterDevices
c:attribute.description: The set of devices that participate in the water service.

c:attribute.name: continuousWaterUseDevices
c:attribute.description: The set of devices that have a continuous water use alert enabled and active.

c:attribute.name: excessiveWaterUseDevices
c:attribute.description: The set of devices that have an excessive water use alert enabled and active.

c:attribute.name: lowSaltDevices
c:attribute.description: The set of water softeners that have a low salt level.

c:event.name: ContinuousWaterUse
c:event.description: Emitted when a new water flow sensor detects continuous use. The device address will also be added to continuousWaterUseDevices.

c:parameter.name: sensor
c:parameter.description: The address of the sensor that detected continuous water use.

c:parameter.name: flowRate
c:parameter.description: The configured flowRate in gallons per minute that was set when the alert was triggered.

c:parameter.name: durationSec
c:parameter.description: The configured duration in seconds that was set when the alert was triggered.

c:event.name: ExcessiveWaterUse
c:event.description: Emitted when a new water flow sensor detects excessive use. The device address will also be added to excessiveWaterUseDevices.

c:parameter.name: sensor
c:parameter.description: The address of the sensor that detected excessive water use.

c:event.name: LowSalt
c:event.description: Emitted when a new water softener is added to the set of low salt devices.

c:parameter.name: sensor
c:parameter.description: The address of the device that has a low salt level.
